inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: shortness of breath about a day before

exclusion.criterion: diagnosis or high suspicion for asthma
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: pulmonary edema, pneumonia, interstitial lung disease or significant bronchiectasis
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: intubated and mechanically ventilated at the time of evaluation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: active liver disease, or transaminase elevations (> 3xULN)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: history of suicidal behavior ≤ 2 years or suicidal ideation ≤ 6 months prior to enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 60-year-old Spanish man with COPD, hospitalized for shortness of breath. He smokes 20 cigarettes per day and has a history of BPH.
